trans-unit.source: Contains data associated with the termination of a workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: Contiene datos asociados a la finalización de una instancia de flujo de trabajo.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowTerminatedEventArgs> is generated by the runtime tracking infrastructure when a workflow instance is terminated.
trans-unit.target: La infraestructura de seguimiento en tiempo de ejecución genera <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowTerminatedEventArgs> cuando una instancia de flujo de trabajo finaliza.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile> associated with a workflow instance includes a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint> configured for a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent.Terminated><xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent>, the workflow tracking infrastructure puts the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowTerminatedEventArgs> in <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord.EventArgs%2A> in the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord> that it sends to the tracking service.
trans-unit.target: Si el <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile> asociado a una instancia de flujo de trabajo incluye un <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint> configurado para <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent.Terminated><xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent>, la infraestructura de seguimiento del flujo de trabajo coloca <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowTerminatedEventArgs> en <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord.EventArgs%2A> en el <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord> que envía al servicio de seguimiento.

trans-unit.source: A workflow instance may be terminated in one of three ways: the host may call <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.Terminate%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>; a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.TerminateActivity> activity may be invoked from inside the workflow instance; or an unhandled exception may occur.
trans-unit.target: Una instancia de flujo de trabajo puede finalizar de una las tres maneras siguientes: el host puede llamar a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.Terminate%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>; se puede invocar una actividad <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.TerminateActivity> desde dentro de la instancia de flujo de trabajo; o se puede producir una excepción no controlada.

trans-unit.source: If the workflow is terminated by the host or a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.TerminateActivity> activity, the runtime tracking infrastructure sets <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowTerminatedEventArgs.Exception%2A> to a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.WorkflowTerminatedException> that has its <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> property set to a description of the reason for the termination.
trans-unit.target: Si el host o una actividad <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.TerminateActivity> finalizan el flujo de trabajo, la infraestructura de seguimiento en tiempo de ejecución establece <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowTerminatedEventArgs.Exception%2A> en <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.WorkflowTerminatedException> cuya propiedad <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> está establecida en una descripción de la razón de la finalización.

trans-unit.source: If the workflow is terminated because of an unhandled exception, the runtime tracking infrastructure passes the unhandled exception in <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowTerminatedEventArgs.Exception%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Si el flujo de trabajo finaliza debido a una excepción no controlada, la infraestructura de seguimiento en tiempo de ejecución pasa la excepción no controlada en <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowTerminatedEventArgs.Exception%2A>.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowTerminatedEventArgs> is used only by the runtime tracking service to pass information in a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord>.
trans-unit.target: El servicio de seguimiento en tiempo de ejecución utiliza <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowTerminatedEventArgs> únicamente para pasar información en <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord>.

trans-unit.source: The data for a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.WorkflowTerminated?displayProperty=nameWithType> event is passed in a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowTerminatedEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: Los datos de un evento <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.WorkflowTerminated?displayProperty=nameWithType> se pasan en <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowTerminatedEventArgs>.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates a method, named `WriteTerminatedEventArgs`, which captures a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowTerminatedEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: El ejemplo de código siguiente muestra un método, denominado `WriteTerminatedEventArgs`, que captura <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowTerminatedEventArgs>.

trans-unit.source: The code checks whether the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowTerminatedEventArgs.Exception%2A> property is `null` (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: El código comprueba si la propiedad <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowTerminatedEventArgs.Exception%2A> es `null` (`Nothing` en Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: If it is not, the code writes the message associated with the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowTerminatedEventArgs.Exception%2A> property to the console.
trans-unit.target: Si no lo es, el código escribe el mensaje asociado a la propiedad <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowTerminatedEventArgs.Exception%2A> en la consola.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowTerminatedEventArgs.Exception%2A> is `null` (`Nothing`), the code does not write any exception information to the console.
trans-unit.target: Si <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowTerminatedEventArgs.Exception%2A> es `null` (`Nothing`), el código no escribe información de excepción en la consola.

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of the EventArgs Tracking SDK Sample from the Program.cs file.
trans-unit.target: Este ejemplo de código pertenece al SDK de seguimiento de EventArgs del archivo Program.cs.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [EventArgs Tracking Sample](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/94818da2-c3c4-4a13-b47a-a0fb30dbbf1c).
trans-unit.target: Para obtener más información, consulte [ejemplo de seguimiento de EventArgs](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/94818da2-c3c4-4a13-b47a-a0fb30dbbf1c).

trans-unit.source: Gets the exception that caused the workflow instance to be terminated.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene la excepción que hizo que finalizara la instancia de flujo de trabajo.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Exception" /> that caused the workflow instance to be terminated.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Exception" /> que hizo que la instancia de flujo de trabajo finalizara.

trans-unit.source: When the workflow instance is terminated because of an unhandled exception, <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowTerminatedEventArgs.Exception%2A> contains the unhandled exception.
trans-unit.target: Cuando la instancia de flujo de trabajo finaliza debido a una excepción no controlada, <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowTerminatedEventArgs.Exception%2A> contiene la excepción no controlada.

trans-unit.source: When the workflow instance is terminated by either a host call to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.Terminate%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or by a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.TerminateActivity> activity, <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowTerminatedEventArgs.Exception%2A> contains a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.WorkflowTerminatedException> that has its <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> property set to a description of the reason for the termination.
trans-unit.target: Cuando la instancia de flujo de trabajo finaliza debido a una llamada del host a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.Terminate%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> o debido a una actividad <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.TerminateActivity>, <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowTerminatedEventArgs.Exception%2A> contiene <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.WorkflowTerminatedException> cuya propiedad <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> está establecida en una descripción de la razón de la finalización.

trans-unit.source: If the host terminates the workflow instance, it supplies this description in the `string` parameter to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.Terminate%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>; if the workflow instance is terminated by a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.TerminateActivity>, the description is supplied by <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.TerminateActivity.Error%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Si el host finaliza la instancia de flujo de trabajo, proporciona esta descripción en el parámetro `string` a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.Terminate%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>; si <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.TerminateActivity> finaliza la instancia de flujo de trabajo, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.TerminateActivity.Error%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> proporciona la descripción.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates a method, named `WriteTerminatedEventArgs`, which captures a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowTerminatedEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: El ejemplo de código siguiente muestra un método, denominado `WriteTerminatedEventArgs`, que captura <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowTerminatedEventArgs>.

trans-unit.source: The code checks whether the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowTerminatedEventArgs.Exception%2A> property is `null` (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: El código comprueba si la propiedad <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowTerminatedEventArgs.Exception%2A> es `null` (`Nothing` en Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: If it is not, the code writes the message associated with the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowTerminatedEventArgs.Exception%2A> property to the console.
trans-unit.target: Si no lo es, el código escribe el mensaje asociado a la propiedad <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowTerminatedEventArgs.Exception%2A> en la consola.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowTerminatedEventArgs.Exception%2A> is `null` (`Nothing`), the code does not write any exception information to the console.
trans-unit.target: Si <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowTerminatedEventArgs.Exception%2A> es `null` (`Nothing`), el código no escribe información de excepción en la consola.

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of the EventArgs Tracking SDK Sample from the Program.cs file.
trans-unit.target: Este ejemplo de código pertenece al SDK de seguimiento de EventArgs del archivo Program.cs.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [EventArgs Tracking Sample](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/94818da2-c3c4-4a13-b47a-a0fb30dbbf1c).
trans-unit.target: Para obtener más información, consulte [ejemplo de seguimiento de EventArgs](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/94818da2-c3c4-4a13-b47a-a0fb30dbbf1c).
